tool_description: Validates instrument calibration data against acceptance criteria and tracks calibration performance over time.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: calibrator_values and measured_values must have the same length.
Invalid acceptance criteria: acceptance_criteria_percent must be between 1 and 20.
Invalid calibration date: calibration_date must be a valid date-time in ISO 8601 format.
Insufficient calibration points: At least 2 calibration points are required.
Invalid instrument ID: The specified instrument_id does not exist in the system.
usage: Provide instrument ID, calibration timestamp, expected and measured calibrator values, and acceptance criteria. The tool validates calibration performance and acceptance status.

validation_id.description: Unique identifier for this calibration validation

deviation_percentages.description: Percentage deviation for each calibration point

correlation_coefficient.description: Correlation coefficient between expected and measured values
